core/structured-data/website:
{{!-- Website: include in base.html --}}

<script type="application/ld+json">
  {
    "@context": "http://schema.org",
    "@type": "Organization",
    "url": "https://authenteak.com",
    "name": "AuthenTEAK",
    "logo": "http://www.w3.org/2000/svg",
    "contactPoint": {
      "@type": "ContactPoint",
      "telephone": "+1-404-525-1995",
      "contactType": "Customer service"
    },
    "sameAs": [
      "https://www.facebook.com/Authenteak",
      "https://www.instagram.com/authenteak/",
      "https://www.pinterest.com/authenteak/?autologin=true",
      "https://twitter.com/authenteak"
    ]
  }
</script>
<script type="application/ld+json">
  {
    "@context": "http://schema.org",
    "@type": "WebSite",
    "name": "{{settings.store_name}}",
    "url": "{{urls.home}}",
    "potentialAction": {
      "@type": "SearchAction",
      "target": "{{urls.search}}?search_query={search_term_string}",
      "query-input": "required name=search_term_string"
    }
  }
</script>
